message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $700000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value you're placing on this product, $700000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at this time. I'm willing to offer $650000 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $675000. I think this is a fair compromise that still reflects the product's value to you.
